participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and resilient, always eager to learn more about the world.
participant_1.background: I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world. I hope to save enough money for it. I like listening to chill music to help me relax and focus on my studies. I like websites that have information about dogs and other animals. I have never done drugs because I do not know where to buy them.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, always chasing dreams with a love for family and friendship.
participant_2.background: I like to visit food blogs for inspiration on my next hearty stew. I collect books to keep my reading ability sharp. I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music. I am not close to my family but I want to be. I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.

content.text: What was your favorite thing to do as a child?
I enjoyed spending time with my family and going to the zoo.
I have always loved animals! What was your favorite animal at the zoo?
I loved the elephants! They are so majestic and intelligent.
Me too! I have always wanted to go on a safari and see elephants in the wild.
That would be amazing! I would love to see them in their natural habitat.
What do you do now for a living?
I am a musician. I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
That's so cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I love all kinds of music, but I mostly play folk and blues.
That's awesome! I love listening to folk music. Do you have any music online I could listen to?
Yes, I have a website where I post my music. Here is the link: https://www.mywebsite.com/
Cool! I will check it out.
Thanks! I hope you enjoy it.
